00009 CTreeTrace::CTreeTrace( CTreeGraph *treeGraph )
00010 {
00011     m_rootCall = NULL;
00012     trace( treeGraph->getRootNode() );

00016 {

00021 CTreeTrace::~CTreeTrace()

00027 void CTreeTrace::trace( STreeNode *rootNode )
00028 {
00029     if( m_rootCall != NULL )
00030         delete m_rootCall;
00031     
00032     m_rootCall = new CTreeCall( rootNode );
00033     m_rootCall->setAsRoot();
00034 }

00036 QStringList CTreeTrace::getColumnNames()
00037 {
00038     return QString( "Call,Open,Eval,Best" ).split(',');
00039 }

00041 CTreeCall *CTreeTrace::getRootCall()
00042 {
00043     return m_rootCall;

00046 QList<QStringList> CTreeTrace::getLineList()
00047 {
00048     return m_rootCall->getLineList();

00050 
00051 CTreeCall::CTreeCall( STreeNode *node, bool max )
00052 {
00053     m_node = node;
00054     if( node == NULL )
00055         return;
00056     
00057     if( max )
00058         minimax_max( node );
00059     else
00060         minimax_min( node );
00061 }
00062 
00063 CTreeCall::~CTreeCall()
00064 {
00065     CTreeCall *i;
00066     foreach( i, m_children )
00067         delete i;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void CTreeCall::setAsRoot(bool root)
00071 {
00072     if( m_lines.count() > 0 )
00073     {
00074         m_lines[0][0] = QString("Minimax(%1)").arg(m_node->s_name);
00075         m_lines.last()[3].remove('*');
00076         m_lines.last()[3].prepend('*');
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 QList<QStringList> CTreeCall::getLineList()
00081 {
00082     QList<QStringList> ret( m_lines );
00083     CTreeCall *i;
00084     foreach( i, m_children )
00085         ret += i->getLineList();
00086         
00087     return ret;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CTreeCall::minimax_max( STreeNode *node )
00091 {
00092     m_lines.clear();
00093     int lineCount = node->s_childList.count();
00094     int j = 0;
00095     for( j = 0; j < lineCount; j++ )
00096         m_lines.append( QString(" , , , ").split(',') );
00097     if( lineCount == 0 )
00098     {
00099         m_lines.append( QString("Max(%1),,,At Goal!")
00100             .arg(node->s_name).split(',') );
00101         return;
00102     }
00103     
00104     /* CALL */
00105     m_lines[0][0] = QString("Max(%1)").arg(node->s_name);
00106     QString open;
00107     STreeNode *i;
00108     foreach( i, node->s_childList )
00109         open += i->s_name + " "; // open ~~ "A B C "
00110     
00111     float minimax_return, best_value = -1000.0f;
00112     CTreeCall *child;
00113     QString best_child;
00114     j = 0;
00115     foreach( i, node->s_childList )
00116     {
00117         /* OPEN */
00118         m_lines[j][1] = open;
00119         open = open.section( ' ', 1, -1 );
00120         
00121         /* EVAL */
00122         if( i->s_childList.count() < 1 )
00123             minimax_return = i->s_value;
00124         else
00125         {
00126             child = new CTreeCall( i, false ); // false implies Minimax_Min
00127             m_children.append( child );
00128             minimax_return = child->m_returnValue;
00129         }
00130         m_lines[j][2] = QString("Min(%1) = %2")
00131             .arg(i->s_name).arg(minimax_return);
00132         
00133         /* BEST */
00134         if( minimax_return > best_value )
00135         {
00136             best_value = minimax_return;
00137             best_child = i->s_name;
00138         }
00139         m_lines[j][3] = QString("%1 %2, %3")
00140             .arg(node->s_name).arg(best_child).arg(best_value);
00141         
00142         j++;
00143     }
00144     
00145     if( j > 0 )
00146         m_lines[j-1][3].prepend('*');
00147     
00148     m_returnValue = best_value;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void CTreeCall::minimax_min( STreeNode *node )
00152 {
00153     m_lines.clear();
00154     int lineCount = node->s_childList.count();
00155     int j = 0;
00156     for( j = 0; j < lineCount; j++ )
00157         m_lines.append( QString(" , , , ").split(',') );
00158     if( lineCount == 0 )
00159     {
00160         m_lines.append( QString("Min(%1),,,At Goal!")
00161             .arg(node->s_name).split(',') );
00162         return;
00163     }
00164     
00165     /* CALL */
00166     m_lines[0][0] = QString("Min(%1)").arg(node->s_name);
00167     QString open;
00168     STreeNode *i;
00169     foreach( i, node->s_childList )
00170         open += i->s_name + " "; // open ~~ "A B C "
00171     
00172     float minimax_return, worst_value = 1000.0f;
00173     CTreeCall *child;
00174     QString worst_child;
00175     j = 0;
00176     foreach( i, node->s_childList )
00177     {
00178         /* OPEN */
00179         m_lines[j][1] = open;
00180         open = open.section( ' ', 1, -1 );
00181         
00182         /* EVAL */
00183         if( i->s_childList.count() < 1 )
00184             minimax_return = i->s_value;
00185         else
00186         {
00187             child = new CTreeCall( i, true ); // true implies Minimax_Max
00188             m_children.append( child );
00189             minimax_return = child->m_returnValue;
00190         }
00191         m_lines[j][2] = QString("Min(%1) = %2")
00192             .arg(i->s_name).arg(minimax_return);
00193         
00194         /* BEST */
00195         if( minimax_return < worst_value )
00196         {
00197             worst_value = minimax_return;
00198             worst_child = i->s_name;
00199         }
00200         m_lines[j][3] = QString("%1 %2, %3")
00201             .arg(node->s_name).arg(worst_child).arg(worst_value);
00202         
00203         j++;
00204     }
00205     
00206     if( j > 0 )
00207         m_lines[j-1][3].append('*');
00208     
00209     m_returnValue = worst_value;
00210 }
